version_description: - Fixed STUN issue causing no or one way audio on some networks / server combinations.

- Potential fix for issues related to the use of speaker and the routing through speaker only;
- Potential fix for issues related to the audio volume.

- Fix IPv6 issues in mixed networks;
- Various fixes and improvements.

- Fixed issues with low volume during calls;
- Various fixes and improvements;

- Fixed calling with IAX2;
- Various fixes and improvements.
- Various fixes and improvements.
- Various fixes and improvements.

We follow our users feedback and are constantly trying to improve our application in the best way possible. In this version you will find:
- various fixes on the network features
- fixed various crashes
- fixes on some translations
- stability improvements

We are constantly trying to improve our application in the best way possible. In this version you will find:
- Fix for the crash happening when you use the contacts
- Fix for the crash which happens when you try to cancel the QR-code scanner
- Fixes for the French translation
- Stability improvements
- Various fixes

- Fixed a crash in Settings -> Accounts screen
- Various bug fixes and improvements
Fixed freeze on outgoing call.

- Added more detailed TLS network settings
- Fixed conference issues
- Fixed call hold issues
- Fixed calls cannot be merged into a conference from CallKit
- Fixed calls cannot be swapped from CallKit
- Fixed some crashes
- Various fixes and improvements

- Ð•xtend supported resolutions
- Fixed issue with providers list

- Fixed missing audio and random crashes on iOS when using AirPods
- Implemented IP version preference in Advanced settings
- Implemented OS-assigned random port instead of random port between 32000 and 60000 for SIP, IAX and RTP
- Various bug fixes and improvements
